name: Contemplating the Tao of the Blockchain
description: The Tao of the Blockchain audience is they don’t look to do the hard work themselves, and the hard work is evaluating the service and seeing whether or not they can feel comfortable entering their privacy. If they really care about being anonymous, we can put it on and it will automatically tell people if their IP address are being tracked. But I can see that there are a lot of people with a stack of devices around the house, and I think that for some users there is a hard lift to walk through for the first time to start taking that baby step with the movement. And if we can bring them in very early with this, it might be possible to onboard them quickly.
